name: The Visitors (itch) (anthonythompson6)
description:
In The Visitors, fight to protect your hometown from the invading alien-lizard species! Picking up weapons and armor along the way, fight stronger and stronger enemies and board the ship to take down the royals to free your home.

The Visitors is a side-scrolling beat- 'em up where you play as a man defending the planet from aliens.  

You can move to the right, left, back, and forward using WASD and shoot with mouse 1.
